trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> You are just the thing the vivacious observer needs.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the vivacious observer.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_TODO_01<tab>/dance for Notos 666.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the vivacious observer.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_TODO_03<tab>Obtain the bowl of fruit.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the bowl of fruit to the vivacious observer.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_000<tab><gasp> You, my dear familiar, are precisely what I need! Pray help me with my research!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_001<tab>One of our new creations has an extremely wary disposition. Try as I might to go near it for observation, it senses my aether and flees.

TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_002<tab>As a familiar, your aether is thinner than mine, yet you seem more intelligent than your fellows. That being the case, I believe you may succeed where I have failed. Come with me behind the building─I will take you to the creation!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>A creature bearing a strong resemblance to a paissa stares unflinchingly at a bowl of fruit on the ground.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_010<tab>There it is─Notos 666. New as it is to Elpis, the creature has yet to be given a proper name.

TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_011<tab>As I mentioned, I cannot go near it. Indeed, this is the closest I can be. I want you to approach it, and then do something to show that you are a friend. What do you think will work?
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_A1_000_001<tab>Return its gaze.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_A1_000_002<tab>Perform a dance for it.

TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_012<tab>Uhhh, I strongly recommend against doing so, lest you become forever lost in its bottomless gaze... Instead, perhaps you could try gesturing to it. Something whimsical...like as a dance! Yes, I daresay that will encourage it to lower its guard!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_013<tab>Ah, an excellent idea! If it sees you moving in a whimsical fashion, it may well lower its guard!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_014<tab>So go on, try to perform a dance for Notos 666. I shall watch from here. Best of luck to you!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_020<tab>Go on, approach Notos 666 and perform a dance for it. I shall watch from a distance. Best of luck to you!

TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>Notos 666, which bears a strong resemblance to a paissa, stares unflinchingly at a bowl of fruit on the ground. Try performing a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for it to show that you are a friend.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Notos 666 scurries off, leaving behind the bowl of fruit.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_040<tab>Heh heh, I witnessed it all. You did very well, my dear familiar.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_041<tab>Notos 666 is designed to facilitate the proliferation of fruiting trees by bearing their seeds to faraway places.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_042<tab>While their young are still unable to forage for themselves, 'tis the duty of male creatures to bring them food.

TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_043<tab>In leaving you the fruit, it appears to have taken you for one of its own. I wasn't sure how it would respond to your overtures, but I wasn't expecting <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_044<tab>Go on and take your gift, and let us return to Anagnorisis. You deserve a reward for your troubles.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_050<tab>Thanks to your invaluable cooperation, I was able to acquire some very insightful data.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_051<tab>Oh, the fruit. They are rightly yours to enjoy, so go on─enjoy them!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>The fruit looked good, but it tastes even better, each bite a small piece of heaven in your mouth!
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_053<tab>Heh heh, judging by your expression, 'twould seem Notos 666 saves the choicest fruit for its young.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_054<tab>Though it has but come to us, I have a good feeling for the creature. When the time comes, we shall have to think up a suitably fine name for it.
TEXT_AKTKZG006_04281_SUPPLEOBSERVER04281_000_055<tab>Here is the reward I promised. Thanks again, my dear familiar!
